* Desmonus had watched her prey escape, and she hissed in annoyance as she 
smelled the scent of his mech-fluid decrease as more distance was put 
between them.
Her stomach growled in protest, but she quickly patted it to at least calm 
it down.*

" Don't worry, I'll feed soon enough."

* With that she transformed into Beast Mode and slithered off into the 
clearing where the battle took place a few moment before, looking around and 
smelling mech-fluid everywhere. It was enough to frive a vampire bot insane!
Desmonus looked around for a few more moments before taking to the skies, 
her wings stretched wide as she gained altetude.
Her destination was the Alliance base, where her master had told her to go 
in the first place.
It wouldn't take long to get there, but once she reached it she might fe 
forced to take one of the Alliance members as her victome.
Of course, she wouldn't kill it, simply feed.
And all it would feel after that was tired, and sleep would be the best 
thing for it.
But she would never feed on Zardus, that was one thing she knew. Death was 
far better then what HE would do if she fed upon him and he remembered.
That was also a benifit.
While feeding upon her victom she injected a venom into them, one that would 
delete any memory of her feeding, but everything else they would remember.
It was a gift.
Desmonus continued to head towards the Alliance base, her stomach grumbling 
all the way at the thought of a warm meal.*
